metadata.title: CVE-2024-0229 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Reattaching to different master device may lead to out-of-bounds memoryaccess

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-18.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
